name: Covert Syndrome
description: Covert Syndrome is a free to play Coop corridor shooter with a focus on unscripted AI and fast tough combat. Created as a prototyping project we wanted to release it to the community so people can experience Co-op VR for free.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 (x64) Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K CPU Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 1500 MB available space Additional Notes: Optional Intergrated Voip. Mic encouraged for Coop!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 (x64), Windows 8 (x64), Windows 10 (x64) Processor: Intel Core i7 4790k CPU Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 1500 MB available space Additional Notes: Optional Intergrated Voip. Mic encouraged for Coop!
